access_pathway.primary_pathway_description: Patient downloads a fillable PDF titled 'Patient Request for Health Information' from the website, or uses the Swellbox online portal as an alternative.

red_flags: Completed form lacks submission instructions — no fax number, email, or mailing address printed on the form itself
bright_spots: Spanish translation with identical 66 fillable fields provided alongside English version
Five delivery methods including removable media (DVD/USB/CD-ROM) with password protection option
Swellbox online portal available as fully digital alternative to PDF workflow
Patient-first title and 'Myself' as first recipient option signal patient-access orientation

findability.rationale: Level 5: Prominently available — dedicated '/request-medical-records' page found immediately via web search, with clearly labeled English/Spanish download links and FAQ section.

technical_accessibility.rationale: Level 4: Mostly digital with one gap — the PDF has 66 fillable fields for full on-screen completion, but requires printing for wet signature; Swellbox portal offers online submission as an alternative pathway.

content_design.rationale: Level 4: Well-organized single-page form with logical seven-section flow and plain language; minor issues include vague fee disclosure and unexplained witness signature field.

patient_centeredness.rationale: Level 4: Patient access clearly accommodated — form titled 'Patient Request for Health Information' with 'Myself' first, Spanish version, and five delivery options, though a single form still serves both self-access and third-party release.

compliance.rationale: Level 4: No illegitimate barriers — no notarization, no in-person requirement, proper sensitive-info handling; minor ambiguity in vague fee language and unclear witness signature requirement.

overall.summary: Merit Health Central provides a well-designed, patient-oriented records request experience with a fillable bilingual PDF and online portal alternative, earning a solid B with minor gaps in fee transparency and submission instructions.
